devdoc.author: Otim Fredrick- <fredrickot@gmail.com>
devdoc.details: A smart contract which allows someone [a poster] to post work in ETH linked with description And anyone [submitter] can submit a solution as evidence of fulfillment to the work.

params._fulfillmentId: the index of the fulfillment being accepted

cancelBounty(uint256).details: cancelBounty(): cancels the bounty and send the funds back to the issuer

fulfillBounty(uint256,string).details: fulfillBounty(): submit a fulfillment for the given bounty

params._bountyId: the index of the bounty to be fufilled
params._description: the ipfs hash which contains evidence of the fufillment

params._deadline: the unix timestamp after which fulfillments will no longer be accepted

devdoc.title: JobBounty
